response.overview: Han Wung's father Han Chung is a close friend of Jin Wu-In, and Jin Wu-In's daughter Su-Hyang and Han Wung are lovers promised to marry. The initiator of Taekkyeon Han Wung and Kunghu's excellent master Su-Hyang marry after much meandering, but because of their strong character and differences in culture, they frequently quarrel. Finally, Su-Hyang goes back to her parents' house. Kunghu's excellent master Cheon-Yong who's been admiring Su-Hyang rushes to Han Wung who made her unhappy in order to take revenge for her. But Han Wung beats off Cheon-Yong and comes to know that Su-Hyang is pregnant of his baby. Su-Hyang runs to him in a hurry worrying about him and they hold tight each other.
response.title: Marriage of Martial Arts
